name: Federal Power Bill 1.3
description:
Cost to buy power is: 1,77e per kwh.             1 kwh is equal to running a machine that uses 1000 power for one hour

This law makes all power on White Tiger a federal resources controlled by the federal government. The federal government will compensate any producer with a value of 1,77e per kwh produced from Industrial Generators / Wind Turbine/ Solar Power. 
We deem that Combustion generators an harmful technology and will only be compensating for its power generation not the running cost. This will be 1,77e per kwh through a rebate on pollution account and powerbill

Buying power from the government is set at the same rate we compensate it for 1,77e per kwh from the producers. This makes it at least cost neutral for someone who wants to use their own power from Combustion Generators / Industrial Generators / Wind Turbine / Solar Power.
We also give an extra payment of 1,56e for Industrial Generators per kwh to compensate for the running cost.
For Wind Turbine / Solar Power we give an extra payment of 5,23e per kwh on top of the 1.77e for a total of 7e payment per kwh 

Power bill taxes in a suspended state and section 3 collects its every hour to reduce the amount of spam in our citizens accounts.

Section 1 Covers the billing of power
Section 2 Covers payment for green power to the producer
Section 3 Covers collecting the powerbill from its suspended state
Section 4 Covers the Payment and rebate for the Industrial Generators
Section 5 Covers the rebate for the Combustion Generators

Because of limitations in the coding of laws on White Tiger, this payment structure is only valid for all non-elected citizens and companies.
If you are an elected official and operating a generator, we need you to contact the federal government.

properties.Title: Power Bill
properties.UserDescription: bills the use of power to all entities. All used power by elected official will be assumed to be for private used. Elected official who operates government owned items that consume power needs to contact the Federal government to draft out a contract to get those items excluded if they do not wish to pay for them out of pocket.

properties.Title: Payment for providing Green Power
properties.UserDescription:
Gives a payment for Citizens for providing Green power. 7e per kwh.
If you are a mayor/Governor you will not be eligible for this law. You can request to be included by contacting the government, Special rules will apply to not get presonal advantages for government owned IGs
We have also included some excempted districts which is to deal with government should not be included in this law

properties.Title: Handels rebates and payments of Industrial Generators
properties.UserDescription:
This law gives citizens a rebate and payment for producing power with an IG. 1,77e rebate per kwh which will work on both power tax and pollution tax. 1,56e payment per kwh to cover running cost for the IG 
If you are a mayor/Governor you will not be eligible for this law. You can request to be included by contacting the government, Special rules will apply to not get presonal advantages for government owned IGs
We have also included some excempted districts which is to deal with government should not be included in this law

properties.Title: Handles rebate for Combustion Generators
properties.UserDescription:
Takes the power from the producer and compensate it with a 1,77e rebate per kwh on the pollution tax account and power bill law.
If you are a mayor/Governor you will not be eligible for this law. You can request to be included by contacting the government, Special rules will apply to not get presonal advantages for government owned CG
We have also included some excempted districts which is to deal with government should not be included in this law
